name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Viaplay Skipper: skip recaps, intros & more

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically skip intros, recaps and go to next episode on Viaplay.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save your time, muscles and keyboard buttons! 💪
One click to play all series episodes in a row without a single move from the couch. 🛋️

Add Viaplay Skipper to your browser to automatically: 🌐

Skip intros ⏩
Skip recaps ⏭️
Go to the next episode ➡️
One extension to play all episodes of your favorite series in a row smoothly. 🎬 All you need to do is to add the extension to your browser, switch on skipping options using toggles and log into your Viaplay account. Now you are ready to binge series all night. It is as simple as that! 😁

No unnecessary clicking when watching Viaplay series anymore! 🚫

How does it work? 🤔
Skipper automatically clicks "skip" buttons which appear while watching. Please note that the extension won't work if such a button is not available by default. ⚠️
